message: Let's split fairly, more for me!
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it a bit more even. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer? I don't think so!
Okay, Alice, let's be realistic.  We both lose if this drags on.  This is my final offer.
Your 'final offers' are getting better, let's try again!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. I won't accept anything less.
